title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
Introducing Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, the ultimate solution to all your cleaning needs! With a total of 12 rolls in two packs of six, each roll containing a whopping 158 sheets, you get the equivalent of 38 regular rolls in one pack. Say goodbye to constantly running out of paper towels!

Designed with 2-ply sheets and up to 75% more absorbency compared to the leading 1-ply brand, these paper towels are perfect for tackling any spills or messes with ease. The Flex-a-Size feature allows you to use just the right amount, reducing waste and saving you money.

In a classic white color and with a comparison to the trusted Bounty Paper Towels, you can trust the quality and effectiveness of Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels. Don't miss out on this incredible deal - upgrade your cleaning routine with Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels today!
